Claim: "Two firefighters spray water onto smoldering trash pile."
Referring expressions: Two firefighters, smoldering trash pile.  Firefighters, fire
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsSprayingWater(a) and IsSmoldering(b))) & (forall e (forall f (  IsSmoldering(e) ->   IsOnFire(f))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsPuttingOut(c) and IsOnFire(d))))
